data.name: Thread
data.detailed_description:
A puppet themed platformer metroidvania with world sized puzzles. Jump your way through a land plagued by rot with your magic crystal scissors to guide you. Cut the strings of your foes and find upgrades that turn dead ends into new areas to explore.

Explore a World of Puppets

In this game you will uncover the forgotten lands of Terrastage. A once bustling place with puppets and marionettes all playing their part. But now, the world has fallen into rot and decay. The residents of the world have lost their will and now simply wander in aimless desperation.

Solve Area Wide Puzzles

In the age of prosperity, great structures were built in the world. Now these mechanisms block your path. Use you map to plan your way through the world and reach your goal.

Cut the Threads of Your Enemies

Use your magic scissors to cut the strings of your foes and clear your path through the world. As you progress, find upgrades that enhance your platforming and combat abilities to become the ultimate puppet.
